actor noun [C]
(DOING STH)
a person or an organization that is involved in politics, society, etc. in some way because of their actions: International law recognizes that a state can engage in armed conflict against a non-state actor. Business must work with government and with all other actors in society to be part of the solution to climate change. See also
bad actor
